text: Bajla Węgier (October 23, 1928 – September 11, 1971), better known as Bella Darvi, was a Polish movie actress. She was born in Sosnowiec, Poland. She was known for her role as Richard Widmark's lover in Samuel Fuller's movie Hell and High Water (1954). Darvi was bisexual. She killed herself with carbon monoxide at her home in Monte Carlo, aged 42.Actress, 42, Found Dead In Monaco The Washington Post, Times Herald 18 Sep 1971: B4.
